info.title: WuKongIM API
info.description: WuKongIM is a high-performance instant messaging system. This API documentation covers all REST endpoints for managing users, channels, messages, connections, and system operations.

get.description: Check the health status of the WuKongIM server and cluster
Get the result of database migration operations
Swagger UI interface for API documentation (available in development mode only)
Health check for the documentation service
Get the IM connection address for users

parameters.name: intranet
parameters.description: Whether to return intranet address (1 for true, 0 for false)

post.description: Get IM connection addresses for multiple users

parameters.name: intranet
parameters.description: Whether to return intranet address (1 for true, 0 for false)

post.description: Update authentication token for a user
Force a user device to quit/disconnect
Get online status for multiple users

get.description: Get list of system user IDs

post.description: Add users to system UID list
Remove users from system UID list
Add system UIDs to cache only (internal use)

200.description: System UIDs added to cache successfully

post.description: Remove system UIDs from cache only (internal use)

200.description: System UIDs removed from cache successfully

post.description: Update plugin number for a user
Remove a specific user connection
Kick/disconnect a specific user connection
Create a new channel or update an existing channel
Update or add channel basic information
Delete a channel
Add subscribers to a channel
Remove subscribers from a channel
Set subscribers for a temporary channel (internal node call)
Send a message to a channel
Send multiple messages in batch
Message synchronization in write mode (will be deprecated)
Message synchronization acknowledgment in write mode (will be deprecated)
Search for multiple messages
Search for a single message
Synchronize messages from a channel with pagination support

get.description: Get the maximum message sequence number for a channel

post.description: Start a stream message session
End a stream message session
Clear unread count for a conversation
Set unread count for a conversation
Delete a conversation
Synchronize user conversations
Synchronize recent messages for conversations
Get channel collection for recent conversations
Open a new stream message session
Write data to an open stream
Add users to channel blacklist
Add users to channel whitelist
Remove a tag
Login for manager access

subscribers.description: Specific subscribers to send message to

no_persist.description: Whether message should not be persisted (0=persist, 1=no persist)

red_dot.description: Whether to show red dot notification (0=no, 1=yes)

sync_once.description: Whether message should be synced only once (0=no, 1=yes)

message_seq.description: Message sequence number (required for large groups)

last_msg_seqs.description: Client's last message sequences for all conversations. Format: channelID:channelType:last_msg_seq|channelID:channelType:last_msg_seq

msg_count.description: Number of recent messages to include per conversation

exclude_channel_types.description: Array of channel types to exclude from results

force.description: Whether to force create stream (closes other active streams)

end.description: Whether this is the last chunk (0=no, 1=yes)

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return

count.description: Number of items with this tag

message_seq.description: Client's maximum message sequence number for incremental sync

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to sync

channels.description: List of channels to sync messages for

msg_count.description: Number of messages to retrieve per channel

order_by_last.description: Whether to order by last message (1=yes, 0=no)

tags.name: Route
tags.description: User routing and connection address endpoints
